content.title: ELSA-2024-5583:  libreoffice security update (MODERATE)
content.description:
[7.1.8.1-14.0.1]
- Replace colors with Oracle colors [Orabug: 32120093]
- Added the --with-hamcrest option to configure.

[7.1.8.1]
- Remove Red Hat branding
- Change vendor to RESF

[1:7.1.8.1-14]
- Fix CVE-2024-6472 remove ability to trust not validated macro signatures in
  high security
